Name: Lovely Tesserae
About the game: One heroic slime has been given the noble task of undressing fantasy girls. Can he do it? Or will the evil forces that impede his goal manage to stop him? Find out as you play through 25+ levels of tile-based puzzle/adventure! Game Features -Great artwork -Challenging yet rewarding gameplay -20+ songs -Slime
